# Interface KnowledgeNodeFactoryInterface

Interface for knowledge node factory parameters.

interface KnowledgeNodeFactoryInterface {  
id: string;  
ids: string[];  
knowledge: [Knowledge](/classes/primitives_knowledge_knowledge.Knowledge);  
}
